text: Here is the learning knowledge base for Python and React.

modules.title: Week 1 – Setup & Basics
modules.description: Install Python, run your first script, understand variables and basic data types.
dailyPlan: Learn Python installation, IDE setup, and environment basics.
Understand variables, data types, and input/output.
Follow guided examples for printing, formatting, and simple calculations.
Practice exercises on variables and type conversions.
Review concepts and complete a mini-quiz.

modules.title: Week 2 – Control Flow
modules.description: If/else, loops, logical operators and simple console programs.
dailyPlan: Learn conditional statements and logical operators.
Watch tutorials on if/elif/else and decision structures.
Practice writing branching logic and comparisons.
Work on loops: for-loops, while-loops, and iterations.
Build a small console program combining conditions and loops.

modules.title: Week 3 – Data Structures
modules.description: Lists, tuples, sets, dictionaries, and when to use each one.
dailyPlan: Learn list operations, slicing, and list methods.
Study tuples and sets — differences and practical uses.
Practice solving problems using lists, sets, and data grouping.
Learn dictionaries and key-value operations.
Build a mini-task involving data parsing and grouping.

modules.title: Week 4 – Functions & Modules
modules.description: Write reusable functions, import modules, organize your code.
dailyPlan: Learn how to define functions and pass parameters.
Watch content on return values and scope.
Practice writing modular, reusable functions.
Learn and use built-in Python modules.
Organize code in multiple files and build small utilities.

modules.title: Week 5 – Files & Errors
modules.description: Read/write files, handle exceptions, work with real-world data.
dailyPlan: Learn file reading/writing using Python I/O.
Perform hands-on work with CSV, TXT, and JSON files.
Watch tutorials on exception handling.
Practice structured error-handling with try/except.
Build a data-processing mini script with error handling.

modules.title: Week 6 – Mini Project
modules.description: Build a small app (CLI to-do list, text game, or basic data analyzer).
dailyPlan: Define project scope and set up folder structure.
Build core features and test functionality.
Add improvements and refactor code.
Write error-handling and edge-case logic.
Finalize, test, and prepare project demo.

modules.title: Week 1 – React Fundamentals
modules.description: JSX, components, props, and project setup.
dailyPlan: Learn JSX basics and how React works.
Create your first components and pass props.
Watch intro React tutorials.
Practice building small UI components.
Review fundamentals and complete a mini-task.

modules.title: Week 2 – State & Events
modules.description: useState, event handlers, controlled inputs, and basic forms.
dailyPlan: Learn useState and how state updates work.
Practice event handlers and controlled components.
Build basic form UI.
Watch videos on state patterns.
Build a small interactive component like a counter or form.

modules.title: Week 3 – Lists & Conditional UI
modules.description: Render lists, manage keys, and show/hide UI based on state.
dailyPlan: Learn how to render lists and unique keys.
Practice mapping data into UI components.
Watch tutorials on conditional rendering.
Build a dynamic list with show/hide functionality.
Implement interactive UI with list updates.

modules.title: Week 4 – Effects & Data Fetching
modules.description: useEffect, call APIs, handle loading and error states.
dailyPlan: Learn useEffect and dependency arrays.
Watch videos about API fetching in React.
Practice fetching JSON from a public API.
Add loading + error UI states.
Build a reusable API-request hook.

modules.title: Week 5 – Routing & Structure
modules.description: Use React Router, organize pages and layout components.
dailyPlan: Learn React Router and how routes work.
Build navigation between pages.
Practice organizing layout components.
Build nested routes (dashboard, profile, etc.).
Refactor project structure for scalability.

modules.title: Week 6 – Capstone Project
modules.description: Build a small multi-page app such as a notes app or movie browser.
dailyPlan: Plan your project and define components.
Build major functionality and routes.
Implement API integration (optional).
Add UI polish and state features.
Finalize, test, and deploy the project.
